commits.comment: Initial checkin of standalone Tiles into the Struts sandbox. Here's the README.txt file in the top-level directory:
Replace "enum" as an instance variable name, since it is a reserved word as of JDK 1.5.
Remove a spurious <classpath> element that prevents "ant test" from finishing. Of course, this doesn't really help much because there are no current unit tests for these classes ...

Commit an "svn copy tiles sandbox/tiles" command that establishes a starting point for (re)converting the integrated with Struts version of Tiles to a standalone version.  The necessary refactoring will take place with subsequent commits, which will maintain version history courtesy of Subversion.
Move "o.a.s.tiles" directories in each source directory up one level (i.e. out from under "o.a.struts").  Have not adjusted package declarations yet.
Delete the now-empty o.a.struts source directories.
Initial build.xml script, copy in the DTDs we know about (and adjust the Digester registration).
Remove definition that is specific to Struts 1.3 ... can be implemented within Struts proper when it switches to standalone Tiles.
Remove Struts-specific actions that involve Tiles.  They can be re-implemented in a struts-tiles integration layer when Struts 1.x switches to standalone Tiles.
Remove Struts-specific implementation.
Remove Struts-specific artifact.
Remove Struts-specific artifact.
Remove Struts-specific artifact.
Delete Struts-specific artifact.
Delete Struts-specific artifact.
Finish initial package refactoring pass.  "ant clean dist" works, but have not yet tested this at runtime.
Correct the generation of the manifest in tiles-core.jar.

This checkin gives us a viable tiles-core.jar. I tested it against the simple example from tiles-original. I thought of copying over that example and the accompanying document, but we already have an examples directory here under tiles-documentation, so I thought better of it. Perhaps later.
Eliminate accidentally copied file (Struts dependent test case).
Updated Maven build for Standalone Tiles in the sandbox, removed dependency on Struts Core
A couple of tweaks to get unit tests to run.
Integrate the "Refactor DefinitionsFactory and Create Reloadable Definitions" patch.  I had to tweak a few javadoc entries to avoid warnings.
Decoupled Standalone Tiles from the Struts common build files.
Adding reports to Maven build file
Refine URL generation to deal with idiosyncracies on URL.toExternalForm() on Windows.
Correct a case-mismatch on a resource file that caused test failures on case sensitive operating systems (such as Linux).
Corrected dependencies.  Standalone Tiles requires Servlet 2.3 and JSP 1.2
Changed version to SNAPSHOT and included NOTICE.txt in the .jar file. tiles-core-SNAPSHOT.jar has been published to http://cvs.apache.org/repository/tiles/ Thanks to Don, Joe and Phil for the help!
Remove I18nFactorySet copied code - highlighted by Sam Ruby
Updated navigation for struts-sandbox website including Standalone Tiles and Struts Ti

Updated tld to JSP 1.2 (and fixed indentation) Added Taglibdoc and Taglib Reference to website
Removed unused xml source doc and stylesheet.  TLD is in src/conf.
Changed back to version number in build file, fixed version in tld.

Major Tiles Refactoring - API Cleanup - Added more unit tests. - Removed old compatibility layer components. - Cleaned up API by shrinking layers   -  Replaced variaous AttributeX classes with ComponentAttribute.   -  Removed xmlDefinitions package and pushed all that functionality up to      ComponentDefinition, ComponentDefinitions, ComponentListAttribute, and      ComponentAttribute - Corrected URLs in DTD and TLD.
Switch to SNAPSHOT version number, add dependency on the artifact plugin, and update properties for deploying to the Apache internal repo. Contributed by: Joe Germuska
Build file and website updates.
